SEARCH
Package model

Class Patient

java.lang.Object
model.User
model.Patient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Patient extends User
Represents a patient in the medical system. Each patient has a medical record, a list of appointments, and appointment requests. Provides methods to update personal information and manage appointments and requests.
Since:
2024-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hoo Jing Huan, Tan Wen Rong, Yeoh Kai Wen

  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient(String id, String name, String dob, String gender, String bloodType, String contactInfo, int age)
      Constructs a Patient object with detailed information. Initializes a medical record and sets up lists for appointments and requests.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the patient
      name - The name of the patient
      dob - The date of birth of the patient
      gender - The gender of the patient
      bloodType - The blood type of the patient
      contactInfo - The contact information (email) of the patient
      age - The age of the patient

    • Patient

      public Patient(String id, String password, String name)
      Constructs a Patient object with a given ID, password, and name. Initializes the medical record with basic details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the patient
      password - The password for the patient
      name - The name of the patient

    • Patient

      public Patient(String id, String name)
      Constructs a Patient object with a given ID and name. Password defaults to "password".
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the patient
      name - The name of the patient

    • Patient

      public Patient(String id, String name, String password, MedicalRecord record)
      Constructs a Patient object with a given ID, name, password, and medical record. Initializes lists for appointments and requests.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the patient
      name - The name of the patient
      password - The password for the patient
      record - The medical record associated with the patient

    • createController

      public SessionController createController(Scanner scanner)
      Creates a session controller for the patient, used for accessing the patient dashboard.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • checkOverlapping

      public boolean checkOverlapping(LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Checks if there is an overlapping appointment for the given date and time. Iterates through the list of appointments and compares the date and start time of each appointment.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to check for overlapping appointments
      time - The time to check for overlapping appointments
      Returns:
      true if there is an overlapping appointment, false otherwise
